Nimble_Slash.help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Power_Slice.help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Ablating_Strike.help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Ablating_Strike.targetHelp: The blades have reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Throwing_Knives.help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast
Throwing_Knives.targetHelp: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the wound left by the Throwing Knife.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Typhoons_Edge.help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a striking attack. This attack is the finishing move in both the Weaken and Sweep combination attacks. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Typhoons_Edge.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Defenses have been reduced by the Weaken combo!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: Your Weaken combo reduces {PlayerDest}'s chance to hit and Defense!
messages.victimHit: Your chance to hit and Defenses have been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s Weaken combo!

Blinding_Feint.help: You perform a feint attack that deals light damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to your chance to hit and damage for a brief time. This power is the finishing move in the Empower combination attack. Damage: Light, Recharge: Slow
Blinding_Feint.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} attack has increased your attack and damage for a short duration.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: Your Empower combo further improves your damage and To-hit for your next few attacks!

Vengeful_Slice.help: Unleashes a series of strong attacks on your foe, dealing high lethal damage and knocking them down. This power is needed for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Sweeping_Strike.help: You make a sweeping strike with your blades, hitting all foes in a cone in front of you and dealing superior lethal damage to each. This power is the finishing move for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Superior Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time [VITAL STRIKE!].

One_Thousand_Cuts.help: Unleashes a flurry of attacks on all foes in a cone in front of you, dealing moderate lethal damage to each foe hit. This power is the opening move for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
